Message:
Since I have the power of
a witch, there are plenty
of jobs for me to do
so long as I’m not picky.

That scrap of bread left me
with a heavy heart,
but even it gradually got
used to this way of life.

And besides,
the backstreets were
teeming with orphans
like me.

Whispering those words
made me feel a little better.

I put my life on the line for
a meager amount of money,

then share tiny pieces of
bread with everyone.

but when those innocent
smiles said, “Thank you
for everything, Iris,”

Ahh... This was the life
I always wished for.

At last, I found
my true family.
